greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smoothed version of A091579.
comment: Obtained from A091579 by the following transformation: replace 4 by 3, 1; replace 9 by 8, 1; 25 by 24, 1; 68 by 67, 1; 196 by 195, 1; 581 by 580, 1; 1731 by 1730, 1; 15534 by 15533, 1, etc.
formula: New records (see A091588) first appear at powers of 2. Also a(2n+1) = 1; a(4n+2) = 3; a(8n+4) = 8; etc.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Mar 10 2004
